title: La Fenetre Apartments - WAITLIST OPEN
map_address: 705 Northrup Street near Parkmoor Avenue/Northrup StreetParkmoor Avenue/Northrup Street
posting_body: La Fenetre Apartments is now accepting applications for our 3 bedroom 2 bath units.
Original completed applications must be turned into the leasing office located at 705 Northrup Street, San Jose, CA. 95126.
Located near the heart of downtown Willow Glen, La Fenetre is a small affordable community that has 2 and 3 bedroom apartments.
Our waiting list is currently open for both unit sizes.
The courteous staff at La Fenetre has been trained to serve the needs of our residents.
Our staff is committed to making your comfort and satisfaction our top priority.
Deposits are equal to 1 month worth of rent.
Minimum Income: 1.5 x current monthly rent (e.g. $2,442.00 x 1.5 = $3,633.00 current minimum monthly requirement)
Maximum income limits are based on household size.
2 Bedroom Units - Minimum 2 occupants; Maximum 5 Occupants
3 Bedroom Units - Minimum 3 occupants; Maximum 7 Occupants
*Maximum Combined Annual Household Income Levels Households Must Qualify Under:
